import { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { API } from './config/api'; function TransactionCard({props}){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const form = { status:"approve", } console.log(props.id) const dataApprove=async (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const config ={ headers:{ "Content-type": "application/json", }, }; console.log(form) const update = await API.put(`/transactionn/${props.id}`,form, config); console.log(update) } const dataCancel=async()=>{ try { await API.delete(`/transaction/${props.id}`); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } const onSubmit=()=>{ if(post.value=="approve"){ console.log(post.value) //dataApprove() }else{ //dataCancel() } } return( <> 1 {props.fullName} {props.trip.tittle} {props.status}
